channeldata.description: CommonMark-py is a pure Python port of jgm's commonmark.js, a Markdown parser and renderer for the CommonMark specification, using only native modules.
channeldata.summary: The CommonMark specification defines a rationalized version of markdown syntax. This package uses the 'cmark' reference implementation for converting markdown text into various formats including html, latex and groff man. In addition it exposes the markdown parse tree in xml format. Also includes opt-in support for GFM extensions including tables, autolinks, and strikethrough text.
